moduleMetadataJson.name: Censys Search
moduleMetadataJson.description:
The module use the Censys REST API to access the same data
        accessible through web interface. The search endpoint allows searches
        against the current data in the IPv4, Top Million Websites, and
        Certificates indexes using the same search syntax as the primary site.
author: Nixawk

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: CENSYS_SEARCHTYPE
options.description: The Censys Search Type (Accepted: certificates, ipv4, websites)
